title: Road to Bali (1952, Adventure) Bing Crosby, Bob Hope, Dorothy Lamour | Full Movie, Subtitles

sources.title: Road to Bali (1952, Adventure) Bing Crosby, Bob Hope, Dorothy Lamour | Full Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
Having to leave Melbourne in a hurry, two sleazy unemployed show-biz pals sign on for work as divers. This takes them to an idyllic island on the way to Bali where they compete for Princess Lala. The hazardous dive produces a chest of priceless jewels which arouses the less romantic interest of some shady locals.

Available with German, Italian & Spanish dubbed audio, and subtitles in many languages.  Click settings ‚öôÔ∏è to select your preferred audio/ subtitles language.

Writers: Frank Butler, Hal Kanter 
Music by Jimmy Van Heusen
Cast: Bing Crosby, Bob Hope, Dorothy Lamour 
Costumes: Edith Head
Genre:  Classics, Cult Film, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Musical
Original title: Road to Bali (1952)
